CustomField.description: Date the Loan Closed. If this is a CoreVest originated Loan, this will be the same as the Close Date. If this is an acquired Loan, then this would be the date the Loan was closed with the original Lender
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date the Loan Closed. If this is a CoreVest originated Loan, this will be the same as the Close Date. If this is an acquired Loan, then this would be the date the Loan was closed with the original Lender
CustomField.label: Origination Date
